attributes.review: Literally I downloaded it and it gave my phone the biggest glitch ever. I could not get porn ads off my phone for the life of me and my poor mother walked by and was stunned. I tried explaining it to here but she wouldn’t listen and kicked me out. Then I turn to find out this app literally took my kitchen table, MY KITCHEN TABLE. Soonly after I was kicked out this app literally killed me, so caution, this app causes death
attributes.title: Worse app ever

attributes.review: Hey I downloaded this app hoping to hear that my mom would be healed of her weird ability to fly and instead my grandma was sent into orbit and my dads back broke. Yes this all happened spontaneously and for what reason I have no idea, I’m just sitting in the water in a cloud and sipping my tea from a bowl of cereal. I hope this app gets deleted! It’s not good and my mom just got shot while writing this review.
attributes.title: My grandma’s back broke!

attributes.review:
As usual, 
 I am thoroughly disappointed with trumps lack of correct facts and this app only contributes to it. I wanted to download this app for an actual good purpose but found out that it was actually terrible. This should be taken off the App Store as soon as possible as it is contributing to the problem in this country. I hate this app so much that honestly I’m happy gen z is trying to shut it down.
attributes.title: NOT PART OF GEN Z SHUTTING DOWN

attributes.review: This app stole my bed from the phone and I got it to my phone to work it off my Twitter app was just so much you can get to the point of the money you get the more you need more money to buy the more you want to buy more you get to get the more you want to buy it or if ya like to get money and get you to get money or money you can do more stuff and you can do more stuff
attributes.title: disappointed

attributes.review: This app keeps giving me push notifications trying to convince me to smash my hamster with a rock. I don’t even have a hamster. I tried to tell it, and all the notifications switch to saying “I crave rodent blood” kinda weird. Then, every night after I told it no, my phone would start superheating while I slept. I think the app is trying to burn my house down. UI is also trash 2/10
attributes.title: App is Evil

attributes.review: At first, this app downloaded with no problems. But when I tried to open it, it glitched so badly and wouldn’t open. Then, a second later as I was walking my dog, a random tree root grew in front of me suddenly and I tripped and faceplanted! This app also caused me to break a mirror, chip my tooth, and break my nose on other occasions. I finally correlated my bad luck to this app and deleted it!! DO NOT USE THIS APP 🤢
attributes.title: by far the worst app I have ever used!!!

attributes.review: I had to enter in a credit card number and a cell phone number. Now they won’t stop spamming me with annoying messages every 1 hour. And I found out that they took money from my bank account without my permission. They took up to 100 dollars from my account, my bank and I think they may have taken more.
attributes.title: This app steals your information

attributes.review: Trump has been working hard for this country and this app shows his hard work. Great app for supporters and even haters to know what he's up too.
attributes.title: Its a reliable source

attributes.review: this app was absolutely horrid ! I needed to check it out for trump but i could not believe what i saw ! it was filled with racist encounters and remarkes i wanted to puke . my respect for this president has gone down ever since the app got my phone number and has been calling me ! They keep playing the song “Replay” and I just want it to stop! If i could give this app zero stars I WOULD. it’s absolutely gut renching.
